item.title: Glossary
item.description: Glossary # TERM DEFINITION Chunking Breaking information into digestible pieces, all information in a chunk will be on the same subject. Classification Refers to the grouping of a set of specimens into classes or categories, based on some criteria. Closure Helping users recognize when they have arrived at the right place in a website or application. Concept Refers to a group of physical objects, conditions, relations, events, or ideas that share a unique combination of attributes not shared by other groups, and can be identified by one or more words or symbols.
